title: Asian/Pacific American Alumni Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support for students who have demonstrated a commitment to the culture, education, and history of the Asian or Pacific American community and who assist in the achievement of a diverse student body at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for students who have demonstrated a commitment to the culture, education, and history of the Asian or Pacific American community and who assist in the achievement of a diverse student body at CU Boulder.
